meanings: (대조, 비교) [명사] (대조) contrast, (비교) comparison [동사] (대조되다) be contrasted (with), (비교되다) be compared (with/to)
[명사] preparation (for), provision (for), preparedness, [동사] prepare (for), make provision (for), make preparations (for), be ready (for)
lay up against a rainy day
as a warning for the future
